resources:
Ƙara rayuwarka
“Money does not buy you freedom. Time does.”
Tashin hankali a yau RUKAN WANNAN WANNAN TIME TIME A HOURS
minti daya hours shekaru jiya Hakan ya lashe Yawan shekaru A cikin minti: Kullum kullum: mako
Yawan lokaci Lost lokaci rabo Raba cigaban ku tare da abokanku Raba labarinku tare da abokanku KUSANTAR gane tasiri mita Rayuwa na rayuwa Na mika rayuwata: Yi kokarin da kanka: Sabuwar rayuwata: LIME TIME ba Rayuwar rayuwa ta baya Matsalar rai mai yiwuwa yAU
Za a nuna kwanakin ku masu yawa a nan. Danna shi don ƙarin bayani game da cigaban ku da kuma rai mai rai. Danna kan ɗaya daga cikin waɗannan Kategorien don yin la'akari da halinka na yau da kullum da kuma yadda ta shafi rayuwarka. Wannan ginshiƙi ya nuna tsawon sa'o'i da yawa da kuka samu a cikin kwanaki 5 da suka gabata. Swipe dama don samun dama ga Saituna, Bayanin Tsare Sirri, da sauransu.
Samun waje Yau yanayi Da fatan a sake gwada waɗannan ayyukan kamar yadda suke da muhimmancin rayuwar ku (5 = muhimmi) Da fatan a shigar da shekara ta haihuwa wasanni shan taba abinci Hawan (cm) Weight (kg) namiji mace kasashen Rayuwa Hasashen: Da fatan a shigar da jinsi da ƙasa
Nawa kuka shan taba? Yawan wasanni kuke yi a yau? Yaya lafiyar da kuka ci a yau? Nawa lokaci kuka ciyar a waje? Yaya halinka na yau da kullum?
// Option View lasisi Data Kariya Policy saituna feedback lamba info Hotuna: pexels.com 
 
 
 Icons: 
 material.io 
 icons8.com 
 flaticon.com 
 
 Mai zane na Icon: 
 -Freepik 
 Bunƙasa Felix Hoppe 
 
 Disclaimer: 
 
 The data a cikin wannan app suke da dangantaka da your rayuwa Hasashen, tushen kawai a kan statistics, don haka abin da kawai Averages za a iya kafa. Su ainihin rayuwa Hasashen dogara a kan da yawa yanayi da cewa ba su rufe a cikin wannan app (iya). A statistics ne bisa kimiyya karatu da cewa rufe sakamakon wadannan a-app aiki a kan rayuwar jama'a. A nazarin amfani da wannan app aka jera a cikin lasisi. Ina zaton babu wani abin alhaki ga daidaito, Cikawa da timeliness daga bayanai. All da'awar for diyya alaka shawarwarinmu da matakan da cewa sun sa daga wannan app ma cire. 

Shin saitina zai taimaka maka? Idan app na taimaka maka a cikin rayuwar yau da kullum, don Allah a dauki lokaci don daidaita shi. Yana taimaka mai yawa don yada wannan app don haka wasu mutane zasu iya amfana. Na gode don goyon baya! rating Ina son aikace-aikacenku Tunatar da ni daga baya Babu godiya
// Slider Bubble Text low low low matsakaici high sosai high
Latsa sake don fita
// App Intro a raga statistics Inganta lafiyarku Gyara matsaloli nan gaba
Hanyar mafi sauki don cimma burin ku! Ta nuna maka yadda wasu dabi'u suna da tasirin gaske a rayuwarka, sun fi son yin canje-canje. Ci gaba da motsawa ta hanyar kiyaye ci gabanku. Yi nasarar siffarka mafi kyau ta hanyar yin amfani da karin abinci da koshin lafiya. Wannan app yana taimaka maka ka rinjayi manyan matsalolinka. Duk abin da zai taimake ka ka zama mafi kyawun kanka. Ku rayu tsawon lokaci, mafi koshin lafiya da rayuwa mai farin ciki.
